original_text: Wisdom makes a wise person more powerful than ten rulers in a city. Wisdom makes a wise person more powerful than ten rulers in a city. Wisdom makes a wise person more powerful
korean_text: 지혜가 지혜자를 성읍 가운데에 있는 열 명의 권력자들보다 더 능력이 있게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: Wisdom makes a wise person more powerful
sentences.korean_translation: 지혜는 지혜로운 사람을 더 강하게 만든다

sentences.original_text: than ten rulers in a city
